my-school-years-book-hardcover.title: My School Years Book Hardcover
my-school-years-book-hardcover.body:
A great way to keep track of school years from preschool to Year 12

FEATURES: 

  • 16 massive 397mm x 297mm pockets - these oversized pockets are perfect to keep awards, artwork, certificates, report cards, photos and mementos,34 pages including a profile page with a first day of school photo + a double spread for each school year + last week of school + sports achievements + career aspirations page. 
  • Photo pages specially designed to mount class photos. 
  • Prompts to reminisce about your child’s interests each year. 
  • Spiral bound and designed to expand. 
  • Hard cover for extra durability . 
  • My School Years is an excellent keepsake of your child’s school years, for parents and children to look back on for years to come. 
  • A great gift for children’s birthdays, their first day of school, new parents and organised mums.

500-gold-labels.title: 500 Gold Labels
500-gold-labels.body:
When you order 2 or more rolls!

Our Label Collection is the fast, easy way to address your letters, envelopes and bills. Plus, personalise everything you own – glasses, books, disks, mobile phones, CDs, DVD's, craftworks, homemade treats, letters, products and more! They are also great for small businesses looking to label products, letters, envelopes and parcels. 

  • Personalise up to 4 lines, 28 characters including spaces per line.
  • Choose from Block or Script print style and either 250 or 500 labels per roll.
  • If you require any details in capitals, please choose the Block Font. 
  • Labels measure 49mm x 17mm.
  • If you require a line to be left blank, please key the ~ (tilde symbol) onto that line.

 

PLEASE NOTE : Due to the size of the labels the script font is not recommended for any text in capitals. (Accents and other symbols cannot be printed.)

my-special-christmas-adventure-regular-s.title: My Special Christmas Adventure - Regular Softcover
my-special-christmas-adventure-regular-s.body:
Give your child a Christmas gift they can enjoy all year round!

On Christmas Eve, your child magically travels to the North Pole and meets Santa Claus and his helpers. Santa’s workshop is overflowing with presents and Santa needs one special child’s help delivering them to all of the children! Together, they travel the world aboard the reindeer-drawn sleigh, delivering presents and learning about Christmas traditions in different countries.

Personalising your child’s adventure is easy!

Using the fields to the right, enter the first and last names exactly as you want them to appear, including the correct capitalisation.

Please tell us whether they are a boy or a girl, their date of birth, and where they live (a town or suburb is all you need). Your child’s birthday and town/suburb will appear in the story as a special added touch!

Up to 3 friends, family members or even pets can accompany your child on their adventure!  Simply enter a first name and gender and, optionally, a second and third name.

Your name can appear in each book, too!  Enter the name or names in This Book is From and it will appear on the first page after the words ‘With Love From’ which are automatically printed. 

Please note: Symbols, accents or foreign letters cannot be used as they can alter the personalisation of your book.

This book measures 225 x 165mm

personalised-angel-sack.body:

50-essential-iron-on-labels-pack.title: 50 Essential Iron-on Labels Pack
50-essential-iron-on-labels-pack.body:
No more lost property! Use our range of Personalised Iron- on Clothing Labels Pack to ensure that every piece of clothing comes home. Follow 3 easy steps to create your unique and fun labels pack and personalise it with your desired details. Great for uniforms, safety vests, jumpers, shirts, library bags and more.

  • Contains 50 personalised labels in a pack.
  • Each label measures 65mm x 15mm
  • Customise the print colour of your choice.
  • Printed over 1 or 2 lines, where the second line is optional for additional information (Examples: Class Grade, Contact Number, Home Group, Service Number)
  • 1 name per set

 

Step 1: Please choose the PRINT COLOUR of the personalisation you want (choose from BLACK, NAVY, RED, or PINK)

Step 2: Choose your ICON or if you prefer NO ICON, select 000 NO ICON from the drop down list

Step 3: Type the PERSONALISATION you require. Line 1 is compulsory and Line 2 is optional.

Personalisation:

  • Line 1 (compulsory): up to 19 characters including spaces
  • Line 2 (optional): up to 19 characters including spaces

Please note the following application instructions:
